content: mirabilis puff hat crochet pattern looking for a cozy textured hat pattern that s quick easy and perfect for the whole family the mirabilis puff hat has you covered designed in worsted weight yarn this hat features a simple textured repeat that creates a beautiful puff design worked flat side to side and then seamed it s straightforward to crochet and simple to adjust the hat also includes a lovely deep soft brim that you can fold up or leave slouchy totally customizable to your style with seven sizes included from baby through large adult this pattern is ideal for making gifts stocking up for craft fairs and markets or keeping your own family warm all winter long this is a pdf crochet pattern for the mirabilis puff hat the hats are crocheted using us yo slip_stitch single_crochet and half_double_crochet stitches with simple crown shaping *please note*-- this listing is for a pdf pattern written in english not a finished product pattern features sizes included newborn baby toddler child teen/small adult medium adult large adult skill level intermediate stitch half_double_crochet single_crochet and yarn over slip stitches instant pdf download full video tutorial to support written pattern if you are a visual learner us crochet terms uk stitch conversion chart why you ll love this pattern versatile design customize the height and circumference to suit perfect for family-friendly handmade gifts always bestsellers at craft fairs + market stalls detailed instructions 8 page pdf in us crochet terms for clear easy-to-follow guidance materials needed category 4 worsted weight yarn 100% acrylic -
